body.name: Selfie Stick Phone Tripod with Remote and LED Fill Lights - ASHINER 70 inch Heigh Cell Phone Holder for Travel, Vlogging, Live Streaming Video and Photos,Phone Stand Compatible with iPhone and Android
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 11 mins
features: Multi-Functional Design: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod with remote is an innovative device that combines three tools in one – selfie stick, phone tripod, and phone stand. It's perfect for taking photos and videos in different scenarios, whether you're traveling, vlogging, live-streaming, or taking family photos. The multi-functional design makes it a versatile tool that you can use in any situation, making it an essential accessory for all photography enthusiasts.

Lightweight and Portable: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod is designed with portability in mind. With a folded length of only 12 inch(31cm) and a weight of 0.6 Ib(273g), it's incredibly lightweight and easy to carry around. You can easily pack it in your backpack and take it with you wherever you go, making it the perfect travel companion. Its compact size also makes it ideal for outdoor activities such as hiking, camping, or cycling, as it won't weigh you down.

Durable and Sturdy: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod is made of high-quality aluminum alloy and PC plastic, making it both durable and sturdy. This means that it can withstand wear and tear from regular use, making it a great investment for anyone who loves to take photos and videos. The quality materials ensure that it will last a long time, making it a reliable tool for all your photography needs.

Adjustable Angles: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod offers a wide range of adjustable angles, allowing you to find the perfect shooting angle for your photos and videos. With a 270° rotation, you can easily switch between landscape and portrait mode, giving you more flexibility in your photography. The retractable rod composed of 6 sections of aluminum alloy has a maximum stretching length of 70 inch, making it perfect for taking photos of large groups or landscapes.

Hands-free Photos and Videos: With the detachable wireless remote controller, you can take hands-free photos and videos. This feature is particularly useful when you're in a busy or crowded location, as you can set up the tripod and step away to take the shot without worrying about holding your phone. This allows you to take more creative and professional-looking photos and videos, without the hassle of holding your phone.

LED Fill Lights with Three Modes: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod includes 2 rechargeable LED fill lights with three different modes – white light, soft light, and warm light. This provides professional lighting for better image quality, especially in low-light conditions. The LED fill lights are adjustable, allowing you to control the intensity of the light, giving you more control over your photography.

Stable Base: The tripod base is one of the most important components of any tripod, as it provides stability and support to your camera or phone. The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod has a strengthened base that is designed for improved load-bearing and anti-slip capabilities. The extended tripod legs (8.6 inch, 22 cm) and umbrella-shaped skeleton structure provide a stable base, even on uneven surfaces. The core foothold is made of premium zinc alloy, which can support up to 22Ib(10 kg).

Compatibility with Most Smartphones: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod is compatible with most smartphones, including iPhones and Android devices. The retractable phone adapter is suitable for mobile phones with a screen size of 4-7 inches, and a rubber pad is added to protect the mobile phone frame. This means that you don't have to worry about whether your phone will fit the tripod or not, making it a versatile tool that you can use with any smartphone you own.

Long Battery Life: The remote control is equipped with a 55 mAh battery capacity, which supports USB charging. This means that you can easily charge it with a USB cable, whether you're at home or on the go. Once fully charged, the remote control can take up to 2000 photos continuously, so you won't have to worry about running out of battery in the middle of your photo shoot. Additionally, when not in use, you can store the remote control in the card slot to avoid losing it.

Great Gift: The ASHINER selfie stick phone tripod with remote is an affordable yet high-quality option, making it a perfect gift for anyone who loves to take photos and videos. Whether they're a professional photographer or just starting, this selfie stick tripod is a useful and practical tool that they will appreciate. It's also a great gift for anyone who loves to travel or take part in outdoor activities, as it's lightweight and easy to carry around.

What size mobile phone is this selfie stick compatible with? It fits most 4-7 inch smartphones, including iPhone and Android devices. How do I turn on and adjust the lights? There are switch buttons on the left and right sides of it, click the switch to change the light mode, and long press the switch to turn off the fill light. What is the maximum height this tripod can be adjusted to? This tripod height can be adjusted between 12-70 inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for your phone video and photo taking
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Recently purchased this because I started diving more into social media content. I seen this and bought it from Black Friday sale so it was also 30% off when I got it. I use it daily, I’ve used it to film family gathering. I set it up in a corner, adjust my camera zoom and let it sit there. The small remote is a little scary at first because it so small and has the ability to get lost in the mix of things, but it also comes in handy, I can start recording and taking photos all with the remote and I can be a good amount away from my phone too.. it helped me take big group photos so no one was trying to run into the shot last minute, everything was set and ready to go. I love that it can open up to be taller and then sit nicely on my desk. It folds perfectly and it has a LED light that’s comes in handy for the extra needed lighting on photos or video. It’s a great buy overall!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!! All in one! Also Environmental-friendly!
reviews.reviewText: It is an amazing selfie stick!! I searched for a long time until I found it! You have all the functions in this delicately-designed product! Long enough, sustainable enough, not heavy, but durable indeed! You can do selfies, also there are two lights at the top. The most important thing is the batteries are chargeable for both the lights and the remote control !!!! You don't need extra button batteries, so environmental-friendly!! This is just what I want! Though it's not the cheapest, it's indeed worth the money!!! A great design! Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was for my 9 year old son and he loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price for all in one stand and selfie stick with remote
reviews.reviewText: Overall great selfie stick tripod stand for your phone with a remote! There are a lot of super expensive selfie stick tripods, so this is worth the price because the remote pairs easily and it's an extra long stand if you want to do stand up shots on your phone. The only thing is that it doesn't feel super sturdy since the stand is thin so that he selfie stick is light. I have not tried to extend the stick all the way while outdoors and maybe with some wind. Indoors it seems find and will not fall over. It's easy to fold and carry around. I would recommend it for travelers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is awesome and does what I bought it to do. I Love it.
reviews.reviewText: Gives me the ability to photo the northern lights perfectly stable and with a remote! Whaaaaattt? Game changer forme.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Livid. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
reviews.reviewText: Read ALL these shining reviews too! So naturally, when I received it, I was so ecstatic! Everything seemed to work great! I tried the lights👌. The stick itself was great too so I just charged it (You have to charge the remote & the lights) Which I did both. After charging, I put it back into the box & waited til my birthday trip.Birthday trip comes.. Took it out of orig packaging & was just excited AF to use it! Turned on lights, started recording, taking pics w a bunch of my friends - Having a fabulous time!About 7 min in, one of the lights died out! WTF!!!! Spent nearly 10 min tryna fix it in the Lyft. Realized it wasn't gonna work when we finally got to our destination. At this point, I just tossed the damn thing! Honestly! I WANT A REPLACMENT! That was NOT cool! PERIOD!ESP on such an important day! I was really looking fwd to so many good memories but yall let me down, hard! Yeah, I'm pissed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Lightweight cellphone selfie stick
reviews.reviewText: This selfie stick have all the features that I'm looking for that makes it easier & more comfortable for me to use during my travel adventures. The first thing I look for is the weight, it has to be lightweight to carry around on my travels & this selfie stick is very light weight, then the length , it has to be long inorder to cover a broad area at the background of the scene of the photo you are taking. , & this selfie stick is 70 inch long , it has fill lights to improve lighting in dark areas & has a remote control, no need to use self timer of cellphone camera. I have tried & used many selfie sticks before ,& this one stands out. The best !!!!So grateful for having found this selfie stick at Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact. Very unstable.
reviews.reviewText: This is actually a nice unit. But to be compact and lightweight, it is not very stable. The weight of a smartphone on top and fairly narrow legs makes it easy to tip over. I wish base was heavier metal or wider stance legs.
I like the detatachable remote accuator button to trigger the camera. Trypod is very stable all in all a good product
Perche parfaite , utilisation simple, lampe de côté utile
smidigt & prisvärt. Älskar Fjärrkontrollen. DOCK är det lite gungigt & svårt att få helt stilla.
Es ligero, fácil de usar. Y firme. Ademas alumbra suficientemente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Happily surprised! So good quality for such cheap price. I’m really satisfied by this stick tripod. I recommend 100%
